visual_assets.name: COVID-19 virus
visual_assets.purpose: represents the SARS-CoV-2 virus, the invader
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon of a spherical virus, dark red, covered in small spike proteins

visual_assets.name: healthy human cell
visual_assets.purpose: represents a target human cell for infection
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon of a circular human cell, light blue, smooth membrane

visual_assets.name: Spike protein key
visual_assets.purpose: illustrates how the spike protein binds to the cell
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a key shape, red, representing a virus spike protein

visual_assets.name: cell receptor lock
visual_assets.purpose: illustrates the binding site on a human cell
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a lock shape, light blue, integrated into a cell membrane

visual_assets.name: virus entry arrow
visual_assets.purpose: visualizes the virus entering the cell
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon arrow pointing right, blue, indicating movement into a cell

visual_assets.name: adenovirus delivery truck
visual_assets.purpose: represents the vaccine's viral vector, delivering instructions
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon of a modified adenovirus, grey and green, resembling a small delivery truck icon

visual_assets.name: human cell (vaccine target)
visual_assets.purpose: represents the target human cell for vaccine delivery
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon of a circular human cell, light blue, smooth membrane

visual_assets.name: genetic instructions scroll
visual_assets.purpose: represents the genetic code delivered by the vaccine
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a rolled-up scroll or instruction sheet, yellow, symbolizing genetic instructions

visual_assets.name: isolated spike proteins
visual_assets.purpose: represents the vaccine-induced spike protein production by the cell
visual_assets.prompt: multiple small, isolated red spike protein icons, floating freely, simple flat cartoon

visual_assets.name: healthy person silhouette
visual_assets.purpose: represents the vaccinated individual protected by immunity
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon silhouette of a healthy person, light green, profile view

visual_assets.name: antibody defenders
visual_assets.purpose: represents antibodies, key components of the immune response
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a Y-shaped antibody, blue, looking active and ready to defend

visual_assets.name: T-cell defenders
visual_assets.purpose: represents T-cells, another crucial immune cell type
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon icon of a round T-cell, green, with small receptors, looking active and alert

visual_assets.name: COVID-19 virus (for neutralization)
visual_assets.purpose: represents the real SARS-CoV-2 virus being targeted by the immune system
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon of a spherical virus, dark red, covered in small spike proteins
